name: MultiDoge
tagline: MultiDoge is a desktop bitcoin client, powered by dogecoinj. Ported from the MultiBit Bitcoin client.
body:
### Welcome to MultiDoge
MultiDoge is a thin client Dogecoin wallet. It's a port of the MultiBit client for Bitcoin.

### About
The app is based on DogecoinJ, which in turn is a port of BitCoinJ (@bitcoinj). You can find DogecoinJ here: https://github.com/langerhans/dogecoinj-new I ported all the needed changes for Dogecoin compatibility over. This programm uses a special branch of it, which can be found here: https://code.google.com/r/maxkeller90-dogecoinj-multibit/

### Download
You can download the current version right here on this page.

### Contributing
Please contact me before you want to contribute.

### Building
Basicially you clone both this repo and DogecoinJ and compile it with Maven. More info is included in the README file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
